description: You won't need an oven to make this easy no-bake caramel slice recipe. With only five ingredients, it's the perfect no-fuss dessert.
name: NoBake Cheat's Caramel Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a mediumsized bowl, add the chocolate and microwave for 30 second intervals, stirring in between, until completely melted. Pour over the top of the caramel layer. Refrigerate for 30 minutes or until set. Slice into bars to serve.
